title: How to Draw a Piranha

steps.headline: Draw an oval for the body, add in guidelines, on the edge of the body.
Sketch in the eyes, open mouth (with sharp, pointy teeth) and gills as well.
Sketch the form of the piranha.
Outline it and erase guidelines, you can add in some scales and lines for the fins if you want to add more details.
Color it up and you're done!

text: Draw an oval for the body, add in guidelines, on the edge of the body.  Sketch in the eyes, open mouth (with sharp, pointy teeth) and gills as well.  Sketch in the fins. Make them a bit ripped. Sketch the form of the piranha.  Outline it and erase guidelines, you can add in some scales and lines for the fins if you want to add more details.  Color it up and you're done!
